TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentTray extends System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class ComponentTray Inherits ScrollableControl Implements IExtenderProvider
type ComponentTray = class inherit ScrollableControl interface IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 提供設計工具的元件匣中的行為。

span.span: Provides behavior for the component tray of a designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件匣代表不否則提供可見的介面在設計階段的元件，並提供讓使用者存取和設定這些元件的屬性。The component tray represents components that do not otherwise provide a visible surface at design time and provides a way for users to access and set the properties of those components. 某些類型的元件，例如，可能沒有使用者介面，可在設計階段檢視。Some types of components, such as a , may not have a user interface that can be viewed at design time. 這些元件通常會顯示在元件匣中的圖示來表示。These components are usually represented by icons that are shown in the component tray. 元件匣是顯示在 [設計] 檢視模式中，[設計] 檢視視窗的底部，一旦啟用的矩形區域。The component tray is a rectangular region displayed at the bottom of the design view window while in design view mode, once it is active. 會顯示在元件匣中的元件已加入，或屬於目前文件之後，元件匣變成作用中設計 檢視中。The component tray becomes active in design view after a component that is displayed in the component tray has been added to or is part of the current document.

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的設計工具和服務提供者。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified designer and service provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件匣監視元件的加入和移除，並顯示適當的使用者介面物件來表示它所包含的元件。The component tray monitors component additions and removals and displays appropriate user interface objects to represent the components it contains.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
